content: **knitted hat for children with pumpkin in drops nepal sizes 2 to 12 years theme halloween ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the pumpkin bits hat pattern for adult here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ne-031-bn yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 2 - 3/5 - 6/9 - 10/12 years fits head-size 48/50 - 50/52 - 52/54 - 54/56 cm **materials** drops nepal from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100-100-100-100 g colour 8903 black 50-50-50-50 g colour 2920 orange 50-50-50-50 g colour 7238 olive **needles** drops circular needle size 4 5 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 23 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/234-72-pumpkin-bits-hat
